api.serializers package

Submodules

api.serializers.base module

This module defines a base serializer class.

class api.serializers.base.DataSerializer[source]

Bases: object

Wrapper class for serializing functions.

classmethod context()[source]

Serializes context information, which contains unread alerts and all room names.

classmethod devices()[source]

Serializes all devices not assigned to a room.

classmethod doors()[source]

Serializes all doors connected to less than two rooms.

classmethod room(identifier)[source]

Serializes a room with the given id.

Args:

identifier (int): Room id.

classmethod rooms()[source]

Serializes all rooms in the database.

api.serializers.room_base module

This module defines a parent abstract class for room serialization.

class api.serializers.room_base.RoomSerializer(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: ModelSerializer

This class serializes generic room information to be shown in the dashboard at the root url.

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

get_co2_status(obj: Room)[source]

Obtains the last co2 status for this rooom.

get_temperature_status(obj: Room)[source]

Obtains the last temperature status for this rooom.

api.serializers.room_dashboard module

This module defines the serialized representation of the room dashboard.

class api.serializers.room_dashboard.RoomDashboardSerializer(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: RoomSerializer

This class serializes generic room information to be shown in the dashboard at the root url.

get_devices(obj)[source]

Obtains generic device information for a room.

Args:

obj (Room): Room from where information is extracted

Returns:

dict: json-like dictionary with device information.

get_metrics(obj)[source]

Obtains last real-time metrics for a room.

Args:

obj (Room): Room from where information is extracted

Returns:

dict: json-like dictionary with metric information.

api.serializers.room_details module

This module defines the serialized representation of a room.

class api.serializers.room_details.RoomDetailSerializer(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: RoomSerializer

This class serializes real-time room information to be shown in the room details url.

get_devices(obj)[source]

Obtains specific device information for a room.

Args:

obj (Room): Room from where information is extracted.

Returns:

dict: json-like dictionary with device information.

get_metrics(obj)[source]

Obtains detailed real-time metrics for a room.

Args:

obj (Room): Room from where information is extracted

Returns:

dict: json-like dictionary with metric information.

Module contents

Imports all required classes to be used outside the scope of this directory.
